15522.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>With this, I can perform a
purification ceremony. It's been years
since I've had a formal ceremony.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15523.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「で:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Then I will go to the Village Arena as
soon as I can. <pc> may come
back later.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15524.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>If I miss this one, I don't know when
I'll get to do the next one. Gahaha!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15525.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
God of war who watches over us in this place. To the victors of this day, may they meet another strong man. To the
losers, may they dare to fight again.

15526.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>And to both of them, give unreserved
praise for fighting bravely and
without fear of death.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15527.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Now the purification ritual is over.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15528.<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「す:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Amazing! I've never seen such a full-
fledged prayer since I've usually just
seen a short prayer!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15529.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「戦:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>It is true that we do this every time
before a battle. These days, though,
it's all very abbreviated.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15530.<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>「ね:
<start_lip_sync n01445 _normal m00001>Hey, hey, hey, So-and-so! What's with
the salt and the bubbles?<stop_lip_animation n01445 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15531.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「こ:
We do this to appease the souls of those who have died in battle here. And we pray that they will watch over
us.

15532.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「…:
In the past, in this battlefield, watched over by the gods, unimaginably fierce battles to the death were
fought every day.

15533.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「よ:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>To create a stronger person and aim
higher. This was the teaching of
Langao Village.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15534.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「そ:
For this reason, everything was given to the winner, and the loser was cruelly deprived of everything.
Everyone believed it was for the good of the village.

15536.<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「ハ: <start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Hi hi hi! I know I!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15537.<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>「今:
<start_lip_sync n01444 _normal m00001>Now they pay the loser as well as the
winner!<stop_lip_animation n01444 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15539.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「死:
Honor them both equally for overcoming the fear of death and fighting with courage. That is the current teaching
of this village.

15540.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「ラ:
Children of Langao Village! Never forget the lesson you have just learned, along with the rituals you
have just witnessed, and grow strong and big!

15541.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「<:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001><pc> Did you see that? The
children of this village must be quite
sturdy.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15542.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「敗:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>We give the losers the same respect as
the winners. As long as the children
understand that, they will be fine.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15543.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「き:
<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>I am sure they will lead this village
to a righteous future.<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>

15544.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「お:

15545.<start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>「遅: <start_lip_sync n00091 _normal m00001>Sorry I'm late! Come on, take it!<stop_lip_animation n00091 CLOSE_MOUTH>
